bars_scale_desc: Scale of the complete bars hud
x_offset_desc: Shift the X positioning (relative to the center)
y_offset_desc: Shift the Y positioning (relative to the center)
background_alpha_desc: Transparency of the background line behind the bars
stealth_behaviour_desc: When to hide when heist is stealth
loud_behaviour_desc: When to hide when heist is loud
frenzy_handling_desc: How to handle the frenzy skill
fade_out_time_desc: Time of the fade out animation when the arcs get hidden due to one of the above settings
show_armor_timer_desc: Show regular armor regeneration cool down timer on bottom of the armor arc
show_anarchist_timer_desc: Show anarchist armor regeneration cool down timer on the bottom of the armor arc
show_invincibility_timer_desc: Show a timer that indicates how long invincibility will persist on the bottom of the health arc when armor breaks
swan_song_intensity_desc: Set the intensity of the blue swan song effect
chico_injector_intensity_desc: Set the intensity of the orange kingpin injector effect
show_downs_counter_desc: Shows your remaining downs above the health bar arc
show_downs_counter_skull_desc: Shows a skull in front of your downs counter (if enabled)
downs_counter_alpha_desc: Set the transparency of the downs counter (if enabled)
